website_summaries.verdict: American brand Skechers has done it again in bringing stylish shoes without sacrificing comfort.  The versatile casual shoe called the Porter – Ressen can blend well with a variety of outfits without sacrificing its affordability. With a budget-friendly retail price of $69, this shoe is a steal for those who want practical style in shoes with relative comfort.  With its great cushioning and moderate arch support, enjoy long walks without injuring the feet or breaking the bank with this sneaker.
pros: Many customers love the smooth leather upper‘s upscale and dressier style which looks great to wear at work
Majority of the users are impressed with the memory foam that makes them very comfortable
Most buyers find this a great everyday shoe that blends well with various outfits
A good number of people find the leather material of the Skechers Porter – Ressen easy to clean
A few reviewers find the suede leather details on the tongue and heel back stylish
Several commenters find the shoe airy and breathable despite its leather material
Quite a lot of purchasers find the Porter - Ressen lightweight and ideal for travel
Some find this useful during rainy weather as water doesn’t easily penetrate the leather
A handful of reviewers noted that the Skechers Porter – Ressen’s air cushioning midsole made the shoes lighter
Various users claimed the midsole absorb impact well
Numerous users find the shoe flexible enough without sacrificing traction
cons: Tongue part of the Skechers Porter – Ressen becomes uncomfortable and tight when the shoelaces are securely tied
A few reviewers complained that the insole is not removable
Memory foam gets worn out easily providing little support in the long run
Some buyers had to return shoes several times to get the right
A couple of reviewers remarked there is a need for a sturdier arch support

customer_reviews.title: Really good looking pair of casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really good looking pair of casual shoes. Received many compliments each time I have worn them. As with most of my leather products, I rubbed in a little mink oil / leather oil into the shoes and they look great. They did scuff easily, but with the oil these shoes are looking great all day with little or no scuffing. Love these -- can't see enough good things about them.
customer_reviews.author: AANSAR

customer_reviews.title: Seem like a decent shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Seem like a decent shoe. I'm always skeptical about fit, since no one seems to have a standard size anymore. I started using Skechers a few years back, because I was having a hard time finding a sporty shoe, that lasts under heavy use. The last pair I bought had different widths, including some extra-wide sizes. This shoe didn't seem to offer that. Anyway, I bought the size I thought would fit. At 1st it seemed a bit tight on the sides, but, now, the leather is getting stretched/conditioned, it seems to fit like a glove. As w/ anything, the verdict will be out, on how well these hold up, but, so far, I'll give them a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Brecht

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and man are they aweome . Well constructed and super comfortable . I have a wide foot so I was skeptical but they fit great and super comfy .
customer_reviews.author: Justin sinkler

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a size 9. 5, Sketchers sent ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9.5, Sketchers sent a size 10 with a size 9.5 sticker over the original label. See picture
customer_reviews.author: Brian S Brown III

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I looked high and low for an affordable, stylish, but comfortable casual oxford sneakers. I bought this one in size 13 (same size i wear in ruining shoes). I have flat feet and was skeptical at first. I wore them to work for the first time and they were awesome. They really are as advertised! The leather is soft and not at all cheap looking. There is a lot of room in these shoes and I opted for a thicker sick and they worked out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: DLNAO

customer_reviews.title: Like 'em, but wish Skecher's was more specific about the width.
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes. The look is sporty and can bridge the gap between everyday and business casual. ... I ordered in "extra wide," but wish I had the option to order more specifically, i.e., 2X, 3X, 4X. ... I usually wear 3X, but I think these are more like 2X. Still, they are comfortable, and I bought another pair. I now have brown and black. ... Also, after shopping in several retail stores for this model, they were not in stock. That's why I ordered online, and even then I had to search for a few weeks to find extra-wide in this style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes. I wanted something like "Chucks" but more comfortable and these are really great. I would like to see better options for shoe laces. I ended up buying white shoe laces to replace the black ones that came with them. They were cheaper than the outlet store online and make it an easy buy. I would recommend these shoes to anyone looking for comfortable, nice looking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Avid-Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great but slightly narrow
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are fine in length but a little narrow for my feet around the toes when i first wore them ,. but they have settled OK and feel good when i walk , guess the width will stretch a bit. Found the laces a bit short as doesn't allow me to tie an old fashioned bow, but my daughter says that they should be laced another way.would have given 5 stars except for the tightness around the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Micropenguin

customer_reviews.title: Great Casual Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a old style sneaker but with an updated flare. These leather Sketchers fit the bill perfectly. As with most Sketchers shoes I've owned, there was no break in period required. Super comfortable right out of the box. I've gotten a lot of complements on these shoes from both men and women.
customer_reviews.author: Pete L

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! I wear a 12.5 New Balance shoe and I ordered these as size 12. They fit perfectly! They also look great! Perfect when you want a shoe that is nicer looking than a sneaker, but comfortable and casual. Great shoe for a "jeans" office environment.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Stylist Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed sneakers with a good fit and style. Comfortable to walk in with a supportive sole. Needs no break in, leather is soft and of good quality. Double stitching makes the shoe durable. Expect to get some good use from this shoe. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Yang

customer_reviews.title: Needed 1/2 size smaller but very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable and stylish. I normally wear a size 12 and I had to swap for an 11.5 and the half size smaller fits perfect. I can't speak of durability but I did take these on a Europe trip where we averaged about 9 miles a day and these were great on the days I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: m7

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I had to return and get half a size down initially, but after that they have lasted me a year and a half and will likely last much longer. After a year some of the leather texture begins to flake off on the tongue, but as far as comfort and structural integrity go, they are stellar. I can walk for much longer in these than I can in Vans before my feet begin to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sole comfort is good for awhile
customer_reviews.text: Sole comfort is good for awhile, but after walking for 2- 2 1/2 hours while shopping,my feet hurt for the next day and a half (no more memory foam for me); uppers are a little uncomfortable, also. I'd return them, but have already worn them- probably will donate them.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Relaxed fit too loosein heel
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes/sneakers. Unfortunately they are too wide in the heel. When I was younger I wore narrow width shoes but as I got older medium (D) width shoes fit fine. Occasionally they were even too tight depending on the cut. These shoes are marked as relaxed fit which made them too loose for me. Too bad for me. Hpe they fit you
customer_reviews.author: Gordon L Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Air conditioned as it states...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a slightly wide foot and high instep these are very cool and comfortable. In fact these are so cool and comfortable that I bought three different pairs as a primary work shoe. My feet aren't barking at the end of the day like they normally do in other shoes. I love the simplistic classic style of these that can be dressed up or down.
customer_reviews.author: WEST | de young

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I love Skechers. These are no exception. They are unique and look great with shorts, jeans, or khaki slacks. Most importantly they are comfortable. They are a little larger than expected but it’s no big deal. I didn’t return them bc they are still so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, comfortable casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, comfortable shoe. I usually take size 11 which is what I ordered. Although it is not relaxed fit, I like a slightly wider fit than normal shoe width which this shoe is. For that reason it seems a tad bit large. 10 1/2 may have sufficed. So I just tighten the laces and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: BillyRo

customer_reviews.title: just bought my 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair of these 2 years ago, were immediately my all time favorite shoes. I ordered a replacement for when they wore out, and now just ordered a 3rd. They look great, are very comfortable, & have held up really well.
customer_reviews.author: jsgb

customer_reviews.title: nice quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these shoes from a local store several years ago. He loved them so much, he wanted a second pair and I was lucky enough to find them on Amazon. They look great, wear well and he loves the comfort!
customer_reviews.author: TJW

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Based on the website photos, I expected the entire upper shoe to be made of genuine leather. That tuned out NOT to be the case. The fit was okay, but I returned them because I suspected that the synthetic material of the toe area might not break in well, as genuine leather shoes tend to do. I probably missed something in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Bupkis

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest quality.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really impressed with the build quality. The leather is really stiff. The upper part that wraps around the heel is too low. They hit me right at the back of my heel instead of sitting on top of my heel. I now use a pair of Merrell's that I like much better.
customer_reviews.author: David Jurkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for wide widths.
customer_reviews.text: My man has short wide feet and Skechers always fit the best. Great price and he loves them! Great look with shorts or jeans. Casual but sharp looking. Consistently great fit for wide feet and wear well. My hubby has several pairs of sneakers and work shoes of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: AKay

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits my foot perfectly. nice wide front. My foot measures 10 3/4" on a ruler and I ordered the 9 1/2. they have a nice, heavy feel to them. the dark grey is really cool. for the price.....excellent deal
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, size, fit at reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Tried same shoe on at the outlet and although the size and width we're good there was an uncomfortable spot to the inside of the foot. Took a gamble that it may only be that one shoe at the outlet store and was right. The pair I order here fit right, are comfortable, and appear to be of quality comparable to the price.
customer_reviews.author: bluswadeslippas

customer_reviews.title: Product Evaluation
customer_reviews.text: The product has met my expectations and is in accordance with the published announcement. I recommend to all Amazon.com members
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Roberto Mattos Paiva

customer_reviews.title: This is a pair great of shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a pair great of shoe. Nice leather upper but what I like most is the cushion soles. Just the right softness, almost like the Dr. Martin soles but smoother when walking. Like the laces too. It's round so never have to worry about being twisted.
customer_reviews.author: jonknee

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. If your foot is slightly wider like mine and can't wear narrow cut Nike as example try these they're very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like them...
customer_reviews.text: Decent look - minus the big “S” on the side of the shoe you don’t see in the primary picture. Plus the gray color had some green tones to it that didn’t interest me. Comfort just wasn’t there for me - memory foam isn’t truly supportive but rather cushioned. With high arches this is a nonstarter.
customer_reviews.author: bw052

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoe for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe at a reasonable price. I was looking for a grey "fashion sneaker" and it was surprisingly difficult to find one that isn't ridiculously over-priced and still comfortable. The memory foam insoles are a great feature. Updating my review because the laces do not last at all! Both mine broke after only a few months of wearing them occasionally and finding replacements in my area in a similar color is really difficult.
customer_reviews.author: James Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Comfortable and looks good. I was wanting the wide fit but was unable to find them anywhere in my size. I have a very wide foot and have issues finding shoes that fit well. This was fine without the wide fit. If I had gotten the wide it would have been far too much room in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good product, quick delivery Will definitely buy again from this seller
customer_reviews.author: Alexsandr

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected :)
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit perfect! Seriously, I have been wearing them for quite a while with no blisters :)
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: They fit a little larger than other shoes that I have of the same size. But not so much that I would choose a smaller size. The heel is lower than what I am used to. I like the looks; my wife does, too. Not too sporty but casual. I haven't had them long enough to evaluate the wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: J. GLEASON

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I’ve EVER owned. Have been getting away with wearing with SUITS! It’s like your walking on Air, literally. I would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes three summers in a row
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these shoes three summers in a row and the sole hardly shows any change. Got more than my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and insole padding in these shoes. They are also very light weight. A great walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: 99 HD

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and I was worried that they wouldn't be wide enough. As soon as he tried them on, he was in heaven! The size 14 that I got him fit pefectly, the width was just right and the price couldn't be beat. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for flat feet. My feet are generally a little too wide for normal and too narrow for wide. These fit perfect. They look nice, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: First pair of Skechers
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn them one time. Just not as comfortable out of the box as I thought they would be but I'm still breaking them in.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I am a 12 in USA size shoes. I went with the suggested 11 1/2 Euro size and they fit perfectly. My only complaint is they are a bit narrow. Not uncomfortable mind you, but I would have gone with a wider shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Scarpelli

customer_reviews.title: I really liked these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these shoes, but I ordered them at the same time as another pair of Muk Luks and ended up choosing those over these. There was nothing wrong with these shoes. I just make a choice over preference and the opinions of some friends. Who knows, I may end up getting these at some point down the road.
customer_reviews.author: waggonab

customer_reviews.title: Irregular Mess
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand, style and comfort level of shoe and thought this price was a great deal. Too good to be true!!! These shoes had obvious irregularities and looked just as bad as a pair that I’ve worn for 4 years. But just cleaner. From loose stitching to seams visibly unglued. I didn’t even try them on and returned them within the same hour I received them for a refund. Buy direct from Sketchers website.
customer_reviews.author: SWebber

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and nice looking. The gray is more of a brown-gray, but that's OK. I'm not sure how the laces will hold up. They feel a little like twine. So far so good, though.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Ramsdell

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. They look good too. Delivery time was as expected... I buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Experienced

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I always had converse size 10, but these shoes are somewhat large and I returned for smaller size 9.5 Now it fits as expected. Comfortable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Doda

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as described and really like the dark sole. Lightweight and memory foam very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne70

customer_reviews.title: He likes both pair a lot & finds them very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these shoes in brown after having already purchasing them in black. He likes both pair a lot & finds them very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SLAF

customer_reviews.title: Didn't wear well for the price - won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit great, looked great and were very comfortable. But after wearing them about 3 dozen times they developed holes one the sides where the foot flexes at the big toe knuckle. I think that only the center part of the upper is actually leather. I loved the shoes, but the price is not worth having them for 5 months. I won't buy any Skechers again I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: dave richard

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these - super comfy - don't want to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these - super comfy - don't want to take them off when I get home! The grey leather allows them to pair with just about any color trousers. I wear them with dress slacks at work, and have received several unbidden compliments from colleagues! Had to return the first pair of 8-1/2 as they seem to run a bit large
customer_reviews.author: zenwave

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes. They fit well are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. They fit well are very comfortable. I wear them all the time. They look great and have gotten a lot of compliments on how the look. Great for jeans or shorts. I have many pairs of Skechers shoes and have been very pleased with all of them for fit, comfort, and looks.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe - shows wear quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Great looking and extremely comfortable. I wear them all frequently. However, I have been disappointed in how they have held up. The leather has not worn well and the shoelaces already wore out. Skechers does not sell replacement laces. Good shoe that would be great if they were a bit sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent look & performance for casual settings.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for those times when flip flops or Sneakers are not appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Karnes

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOK & VERY COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for very conservative husband - didn't like them at first saying, "not me". However, once he tried them on and felt just how comfortable they were he liked them. Once he received several compliments he then loved them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: I wear size 12. So I bought a size ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 12. So I bought a size 12 and they fit perfectly. Another perk other than being stylish is that the shoe in standard form can accommodate my wide feet witch is ultimately the reason I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't own these shoes for long, but they're already scratched, faded, and looks like the sole seam was poorly glued. It is of terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Gamon

customer_reviews.title: You gave me a good product. I really like this product costs
customer_reviews.text: You gave a quick. You gave me a good product. I really like this product costs. I am very grateful to you. I hope you are rich.
customer_reviews.author: choi seok been

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I had until now
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet, never found a shoe truly my size until I found these amazing ones. Very happy with my purchase as finally the support foam actually fits my foot! Also they look pretty good
customer_reviews.author: e s

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Great casual shoe that I wear with jeans to the office. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: brandonj71

customer_reviews.title: Terrific shoe, quality item but the fit was not ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrific shoe, quality item but the fit was not comfortable! I UPS them back to the seller apx. 1 week ago! I received the proper credit! Thx, I be using Amazon again in the future! Have a great day and a better tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Weick Jr.

customer_reviews.title: lots of extra room. may want to stick with ...
customer_reviews.text: lots of extra room. may want to stick with medium width and your exact shoe size otherwise the these sneakers are fit a bit large.
customer_reviews.author: anthony williams

customer_reviews.title: Seriously I love this shoe beside it leather finished
customer_reviews.text: Seriously I love this shoe beside it leather finished, very comfortable when wearing for whole day while doing quite a lot of walking. But compare to another model I previously bought.. the current one, the sole seem to wear off faster.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. More than I expected. Very comfortable with form fitting foot bed. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and sporty pair of sneakers, nice color. Color can wash out if it gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: Andrezen

customer_reviews.title: comfort plus
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband, he loves them. He says they are the most comfortable shoes he has worn in years. May have to buy him another color for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte m. davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are really nice but I received a defective pair. Right shoe has scratches. At this price I expect to receive my shoes in mint condition.
customer_reviews.author: Explorer

customer_reviews.title: Super shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away! These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. They fit beautifully and the memory foam soles really cushion my feet. I highly recommend them and hope Sketchers makes more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Barkin

customer_reviews.title: Minor inperfections but can fix easy
customer_reviews.text: Had to modify the shoe lace holes with a hammer since they pressed too hard on my feet and it hurt.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: says they are the most comfortable shoes that he has every worn
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend. He LOVES them, says they are the most comfortable shoes that he has every worn.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: but not comfortable as your average skechers shoes
customer_reviews.text: Looks elegant, but not comfortable as your average skechers shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... fit because I seem to be difficult to fit comfortably but they were perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered thinking they might fit because I seem to be difficult to fit comfortably but they were perfect! I put them on for just a few minutes and then forgot I was wearing them until I had gone for some chores and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Ruth

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes very much but they seem to be sized just slightly on the large size. Thick socks definitely take care of this, and the shoes have broken in very easily and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Charm City Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Among the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. This is my third pair. Great variety in colors.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Its not relaxed fit as described.
customer_reviews.text: Its advertised as a relaxed fit but I got is a classic fit. It was arrived with completely shattered packaging like a piece of trash.
customer_reviews.author: Arya

customer_reviews.title: Great. Casual wear with my slacks.
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a sneaker a bit dressier than standard tennis shoes to wear at work with slacks. I do a lot of walking. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good shoe. I kept them to give to my nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't admire shoes, but I love how these look. Best shoes I have ever owned. Would purchase again if more colors available in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylen500

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES these! They fit great, feel great and look great!
customer_reviews.author: DAB

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and versatile shoe. Fits perfectly. Makes all my slacks look better.
customer_reviews.author: DLB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They look nice and are extremely comfortable. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Great air sole.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, yet still has the firm feel of a traditional show on top. Maybe slightly narrow for my taste, but I bought a half size bigger for my wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: minnemike

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive shoe. I like that is is all leather upper with some man made fabric on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Rduck96

customer_reviews.title: Painful...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look nice, but for some reason, they designed the tongue to dig right into the top part of the foot. Very uncomfortable. I would've returned the shoes, but I've already worn them. Too bad...
customer_reviews.author: OC

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after 2 months, which wasn't great since they are actually very comfy shoes. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Carmine

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for me! I need a little room and these puppies fit the bill! Sweet looking too.
customer_reviews.author: ronald j chiodi

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, no break in needed. A little clunky looking, wish I would ordered black
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfy too.
customer_reviews.text: They are extremely comfortable and look,very nice. I can wear the as casual,shoes with shorts or throw on some khakis and go out on the town. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: alchemist

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and classy
customer_reviews.text: it's like a Cadillac version of Converse All-Stars canvas - but leather! Sharp looking!
customer_reviews.author: C.K.

customer_reviews.title: Can wear all day and feet don't hurt.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Fit was exactly as I expected. The footbed is cushy.
customer_reviews.author: Jarhead

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe two months ago and I am very disappointed because it peels easily, the price is too high for this to happen to him and it was almost not used yet.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: I thought these were "relaxed" fit, but maybe not.
customer_reviews.text: Although they feel a little small on the width, they look great and feel great otherwise. I will be looking to get another pair, black, in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: mprs4me

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! The guide was a great help.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes with plenty of room for the toes. I'm going to get another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Feeks

customer_reviews.title: Dressy-casual and comfort too.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoes just now. Get lots of compliments. You can dress them up or down. If in doubt on size, go with the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. Comfortable. The laces wear out quickly. So do the padded soles. Leather gets dirty easily.
customer_reviews.author: David Toyoshima

customer_reviews.title: I thought for the price they would be made with better materials.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap fake leather. I thought for the price they would be made with better materials.
customer_reviews.author: T. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and pretty comfortable. Definitely take a half to whole size smaller. Even in medium width they're wider than most shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: They are the cats meow for sure
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers feel like they where custom made for me, sketchers has me as a lifetime customer, i own another pair as well and they are on the top list of companies who produce the best foot ware on the planet.
customer_reviews.author: wwherr3

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fitness , light weight and flex in walking.
customer_reviews.author: Subramaniam Srinivasa

customer_reviews.title: Fun shoe - fit is pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Fun shoe - fit is pretty nice and I'll probably buy another pair once these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schmid

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice quality, really leather. it is pity a little larger. will order a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Porter Ressen Oxford
product_meta.description: Lace-up construction. Round toe. Lightly padded tongue. Signature logo detailing. Soft fabric lining. Cushioned footbed. Flexible synthetic outsole. Imported.
